help:
[CSWP] Community Shader Weather Pack by Sam@ke / Ren_172
Version: 0.1 Revision: 9 State: Alpha
Configurations: "F2" Opens shader panel "F3" Quick disable all shaders (for comparing) "I" starts new demo record "O" press for saving coords for demo (one for start and one for end) "U" play demo
Keys are configurable into script files!!! All shaders can be enabled/disabled by client ("F2" Panel") and for whole server (Admin Panel).
